list.title: Servers Should Be Clones
list.bullet: Developer, Staging, and Live servers should be as identical as possible
Hardware, where relevant: disk type and size, crypto, networking
System Software: OS, kernel, drivers and modules
Application Software: PHP, web server, database
Application Configuration: args to %configure%, supporting libraries and their locations
Build configuration files like %httpd.conf% with scripts to easily substitute locally-specific info
